video.title: Wildest Middle East
video.synopsis: This documentary series touches down in the forests, deserts, mountains and seas of the Middle East, home to a diverse array of natural wonders.

episodes.synopsis: Turkey's snowy mountain passes and spectacular coral reefs, Arabia's wealth of wildlife, Egypt's life-giving Nile and other rich habitats are shown.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Giant reptiles, mystical birds, unique creatures that inspired distant civilizations thrive in the surrounding waters and skies of Egypt's deserts.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: At the heart of the Middle East, wildlife in Jordan faces great challenges, relying on the sun's cycles to thrive in nature's furnace.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Only the toughest animals survive in the Caspian Sea and the lush wetlands, vast steppes, snowy mountains and deserts that surround it.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: In the searing heat of Arabia, where illusion rules, tricks of the light and the art of deception are the fabric of life for more than 500 species.
episodes.title: Episode 5
